This game is the absolute best thing I have bought. I can promise you, you will have a lot of fun hours of gameplay either if its alone or with friends but playing with friends makes the experience so much better. Its totally not a pay to win game, its all about the skill you have and know whats gonna be the next move you make. Ever since i've owned this game there's not a moment I've been bored. Its always so fast paced and it makes your hands sweaty. anyways i give it a 7/10 its very nice besides all of the errors along the way, but besides that its a very nice game, totally worth it.

Игра, в которой, если вы играете за маньяка, то за все, что не нравится сурвам, вы получаете дерьмо в лицо. Они срут вам на странице, если у вас не закрыт профиль. ДбД игра не про маньяка, сажающего сурва на крюки, а про маньяков, которые всячески вчетвером издеваются над маньяком, а потом устраивают травлю. Если в стиме системы рейтингов нет, то на хуанах и плойках, у игроков они улетели в жесткие минуса. Набор перков, для буллинга, итемы для буллинга, играть на высоких рангах, всеравно что терпеть насилие над собой. Сурвам прощается все, ведь их больше. Именно поэтому, зачастую к 20 ранговым маньякам попадают фуллперковые 12-14 ранговые сурвы, которые просто глумятся. Чем это вызвано спросите вы меня? А тем, что количество мань, с каждым днем все меньше и меньше ибо не каждый может выдержать такое количество агрессии в их сторону. Причем разрабы, откровенно забили болт, на проблему люков в катке, "заложников" и все остальное.
cool game best game ever

Gra jest na prawdę fajna jak i warta swojej ceny, ponieważ daje wiele godzin dobrej zabawy, czasem gra przyspoży wiele nerwów i wtedy dopiero może się zacząć... Gra ma wiele plusów jak i minusów, więc je wymienie

Plusy+
-Świetna grafika
-Klimat gry
-Wymagająca refleksu
-Wiele postaci do levelowania
-Różne śmieszne momenty wywołane przez zabójce jak i ocalałych (wiele razy się uśmiałem)

Minusy-
-Społeczność (ludzie kampiący i toksyczni)
-Bugi
-Powtarzalność
-Gra jest zwyczajnie Pay 2 Win po przez kupowanie zabójców jak i ocaleńców, z reguły mają oni lepsze umiejętności. (Choć po wprowadzeniu sklepu jest to trochę mniej zauważalne)

Moje przemyślenia: Jeśli jesteś gotów wydać jeszcze trochę pieniędzy na DLC do gry to śmiało kupuj, a jeśli nie masz zamiaru kupować żadnych DLC może być ciężej, ale to nie odbierze całej zabawy z gry.

Questo gioco è un classico esempio di bella idea e realizzazione non all'altezza (sono stato molto educato): il problema principale, e quello che mi ha portato a non consigliarlo, è il fatto che NON ha server dedicati, con tutti i problemi annessi e connessi: se non hai la connessione degli svedesi laggerà, frezzerà, e quant'altro rovinandoti l'esperienza, che ripeto, dovrebbe essere positiva. Io con un computer mediocre e una connessione altrettanto mediocre devo settare tutto al minimo per un gameplay che dura di media 15 min a partita e per il quale devi ripetere sempre le stesse azioni (riparare 5 generatori e fuggire dalla mappa, che è anche abbastanza piccola). Il fatto che, dunque, la partita sarà hostata dal killer (non avendo server) porterà anche all'abbandono della suddetta durante il caricamento, se non riuscirai a connetterti con quest'ultimo. Personalmente mi fa scollegare da 1 partita su 3 in media, ma ripeto non per colpa mia ma per come è strutturato il gioco (male). Un altro problema è che essendo molto limitata, la longevità, ci mette poco a stancare. Questo problema dovrebbe essere compensato dall'abilità degli sviluppatori a mettere modalità nuove (non pervenute), nuovi killer e mappe (che mettono ogni tanto ma a pagamento), facile fare questo tipo di ragionamento: "non devi pagare server dedicati ma fai pagare il gioco e i DLC?".  No, non sono bravi neanche a risolvere i bug, presenti in medie quantità nel corso di una partita. Ultimo problema e poi la smetto è la community: essendo un gioco dove la collaborazione è MOLTO importante, è facile imbattersi in persone inutili che giocano solo per fare punti, che ragequittano se vengono trovati per primi (sopravvvissuto) o se i sopravvissuti sono veloci a fare i generatori (killer) o se hanno problemi con la loro vita e si sfogano lasciando le partite su un gioco (scherzo ma non troppo) o ancora che non sono proprio in grado di fare team (che non è un problema in sè, non li sto giudicando, ma da fastidio); il problema peggiore, a mio parere, sono determinati comportamenti dei giocatori: giocatori mediocri, che si mettono a prendere in giro i killer alle prime armi girandoci attorno o aspettandoli alle uscite facendo durare le partite più del necessario; killer che restano fermi agli uncini dove si appendono i sopravvissuti per "fare il peep" rovinando la partita al malcapitato di turno. Insomma di idioti ce ne sono parecchi in questo gioco, quindi preparatevi. Scrivo questa recensione durante un aggiornamento di 18 Mb che ci sta mettendo circa 30 min (indovinate perchè), indizio: c'entrano i server

Dead by Daylight (DBD) is a fun game with lots of potential.  Some of the play styles of players as survivors and killers can make or break the game.  

Biggest issues:
 * The 'camping' killer that moves only a few meters away from a hooked survivor and claims they weren't camping just 'patrolling'.  While camping can be considered a strategy and right by a killer (hey they are there to kill you not play nice), it does lead some survivors to rage quit since they have no chance of being rescued, and if they are pulled down the camping killer typically 'tunnels' the injured survivor quickly. (Nothing like just taking out the easiest target).
 * The 'slamming' of pallets breaks occasionally either causing you to rush through the pallet to same side as killer instead of stunning the killer OR *major bug* the killer or survivor is stuck in/on the pallet.  If the survivor is stuck, the killer can break the pallet and hit the survivor (or place in dying state if survivor was already hurt).  If the killer is stuck, the survivors cannot do anything to free the killer so they either finish the round (and get 'free' bloodpoints) or the Killer disconnects and ruins the game for themselves (their score goes to 0 and survivors get bonus "5000" survival points.
 * Endless pallet looping survivors just irritate the killers and can make them rage quit.  While looping is consider by many a valid strategy, it can and does lead to killer's rage quitting.  They may want to implement a change to pallets like they did to windows and block survivors from abusing the same pallet over and over.  This would change the dynamic somewhat and lead to additional strategies.

These are just my opinions of things that should be looked at for improvements.  There are other issues in the game that are addressed slowly.  Sometimes changes are made to killers that are unneeded, unwarranted, etc because people (survivor mains) want to always cake walk, troll, etc the killer and if a killer can prevent them easy bloodpoints its a whine-fest (aka Changes to Freddy when he first came out to his neutered down self).

Feel free to agree or disagree with the above.  I am not complaining or asking for things to be banned, just looking for ways to improve and reduce the amounts of raging quitting due to some of the items mentioned above.

As I said, other things really need improvement (not even going to touch on the "matchmaking" system that can takes extremely long times to find a match to even play), but these are some of biggest issues i've seen over my 600+ hours of playtime.

Da ich nun schon über 319 h gespielt habe möchte ich gerne sagen, dass das Spiel eine 
bessere Bewertung als" Ausgeglichen" verdient hat.

Positiv:

+ Athmosphäre (Survivor sowie Killer werden von Menschen gespielt)
+ Multiplayer (2-4 Spieler im Ranglistenmode und wenn man unter Freunden spielt bis zu 5 Spieler möglich)
+ Ausgeglichene Survivor und Killer (keiner hat zu starke oder schwache Fähigkeiten)
+ Teachable Perk System
+ Die Entwickler sind sehr bemüht das Spiel interessant zu halten und geben ihr Bestes unfaire Vorteile schnellstmöglich aus dem Spiel zu entfernen
+ Mapdesigns
+ Interessantes und einzigartiges Spielprinzip

Negativ:

- Ränge werden zu schnell zurückgesetzt
- Im Multiplayer ist es oft schwer einen Raum zu finden (Beste Zeit bis 20 Uhr +01:00 UTC)

Es ist wirklich ein sehr gutes Spiel, welches ich nur weiterempfehlen kann.

Shallow game, toxic community.

Do you enjoy games that follow a rinse and repeat pattern and kill any creative approach you might have towards gaming? Do you like to be told how to play? Do you like to be bullied? Then this game is for you. 

Whether you're a killer or a survivor the community will tell you how you should be playing. 

As a killer, acceptable tactics include: 
-Chasing a survivor around objects in an infinite loop for 45 minutes stright while other survivors complete generators. 
-Running to the other end of the map to do some sightseeing after hooking a survivor.
-Being blinded by 3 flashlights if you do manage to down someone.
-Being bullied by survivors runnig the same build that includes 4 perks
-Watching a vein pop in your forhead due to high blood pressure 

As a survivor you are expected to be as toxic as possible. If you are not 
-calling the killer a camper, whether they camp or not,
-pallet looping 100% of the game,
-rescuing others from the hook with the killer 2m away so the can be downed again immediately,
-cursing like your horse just died, 
you are not playing this game correctly.

The bloodweb progression system is a farce, effectively eliminating any difference between survivors. The community is part high school bullies, part 11yr old kids who will explain to you that the fact you've won a game only makes you a noob. The game concept is exciting and playing is actually quite fun when you first start, but as you level up you soon become immersed in the fiery hellhole of shallowness and repetitive gameplay mechanics. 

If you're planning to play this for less then 20hrs, go for it. Otherwise, not worth a dime.
